text: Rose and Jasmine Garden is a public garden located on Kashmir Highway in Islamabad, Capital Territory, Pakistan. It is considered the "National Garden of Pakistan" respectively. == Public services == Some of the facilities here include: * Sitting * Picnic point * Walking and running track * Cycling track * Cafeteria (Dhaba) * Parking area == References == Category:Gardens Category:Islamabad Category:National symbols of Pakistan
title: Rose and Jasmine Garden
